name: Toy Car MarketPlace
details: Full-stack toy car marketplace website here with CRUD operations.Users can register as a buyer or seller with Google or with email and password.Users can add toys and see details when they are logged in. The added toys wil show in the All toys page.

name: Summer Camp Athletes Academy
details: Full-Stack summer camp athletes academy website with CRUD operations.Users can register as a student with Google or with email and password.The website dashboard is different for different users(admin,instructors,students/users).Users can see many sports classes and select the classes and can payment with stripe

name: Recipes Corner
details: MERN-stack Indian recipe hunting website.Users can register as a viewer with Google, GitHub or with email and password.Users can see many Indian recipes in this website of famous Indian chefs.
